dict.string:
Aligners
- MAQ is the predecesor to BWA
- Bowtie is the common default for Nick
How to view reads in IGV
- information on the program is at the BROAD website
- open a reference genome. Several pre-loaded, or bringing in
- load a .bam file (binary version of the .sam file)
- command - File> load from file > choose file
- can scan through for SNPs, or sort based upon quality of reads
- can load multiple tracks (same data processed with a different alignment algorithm)
